modShortDescription: New module that hides all the Onscreen Sprites. You can enable/disable each Sprite type as you like. By default all sprites are hidden.
modDescription:
New module that hides all the Onscreen Sprites. w00kien00kie has done the XML Xpath commands individually for each Onscreen sprite and hence you can enable/disable each Sprite type as you like. By default all sprites are hidden.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/wookienookie/a19_vanilla_modlets/-/raw/master/HideOnScreenSprites.zip?inline=false)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19634-a19-modlet-hide-all-on-screen-sprites/).

**Credits:** [w00kien00kie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/w00kien00kie/)
